summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2005 NISSAN MURANO.  THE AIR BAG WARNING LIGHT REMAINS ILLUMINATED.  THE CONTACT TOOK THE VEHICLE TO THE DEALER TWELVE TIMES DUE TO THE FAILURE AND THEY ONLY PERFORMED A TEMPORARY REMEDY.  THE DEALER STATED THAT THE AIR BAG WOULD NOT DEPLOY IN THE EVENT OF A CRASH.  THE PURCHASE DATE WAS UNKNOWN.  THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 36,500 AND FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 15,000.
